Good night to all of you. I have not been able to write myself for a long time due to the intense agenda. I want to share my views with you on some topics.
I know you have a lot of complaints about YouTube and Google. I have shared and shared your views on this subject several times before.
I strongly oppose them being closed. I have instructed the relevant departments to solve the problem in this matter. I also requested that the law be amended if necessary.
There are questions about new passports. This was actually a project that Turkey worked on for many years but could not finish it.
It was finally completed and it was very beautiful. You know, they gave me the first passport.
You know that this is a ten-year passport, so there will be no other costs for ten years.
I also shared my thoughts about the kids who made stones before and gave them the necessary instructions at that time.
The bill was drafted. I know you're out because you have some different opinions at the committee. But I follow closely
I give very special importance to our martyrs. For the first time as president, I gave my relatives of martyrs and veterans iftar at Çankaya Mansion.
And I make it a tradition and I do it with the first ifti every year and it is participating in all the ills.
Every time I talk about this, I pay attention to the society. In the places that I visit, I place my relatives near the martyrs in the meals.
Again, as the President of the Republic of Turkey, we have only come from within the fight against terrorism to deal with our veterans and martyr relatives ...
retired chief colonist specially to deal with the problems of relatives of martyrs and our veterans.
With this occasion, mercy from God on today's martyrs, patience to relatives
Our citizens are asking when to visit their own illusions. I want to visit all our ills while I am on duty.
As you know, Istanbul is the 2010 European Capital of Culture. Arvo Part is a very famous classical music composer from Estonia.
He performed the World Premiere of the Work of Adam's Calling in Istanbul. I have listened with the Estonian president and distinguished guests.
I do not know much about this, but experts say it is one of the most important composers of our time.
I gave Arvo Part a prize. It was really very impressive
Another issue that caught attention this week was the Turkish Olympics
I also visit Turkish schools on my overseas trips. They do culture programs during the visit and they are really impressive.
These studies are very nice Turkish and we contribute to the spread of Turkish culture. I thank you for all your hard work.
Have a good evening with you all to see you again
I and the government would like to invite all people of the people to reconcile to bring about a reform that will create a new future for Thailand.
No matter who the people are. How do you read politics? I assure you that we are ready to give everyone. Engage with this process.
Structural reforms will take longer than the government's age. But the remaining time. We must seize the power of the people.
